module.name: ap210_assembly_technology_constraints
module.name.french: Contraintes de technologie d'assemblage pour l'AP 210
module.keywords: module electrical constraint process assembly documentation specification

abstract.p: the representation of assembly technology constraints. This Data includes all information provided to the design team by assembly service providers from which may be derived constraints on which packages may be selected, mounting arrangements to be specified, permitted mounting areas, clearances, etc. Configuration management information and design change management information is provided. This data includes at least one geometric representation.

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of assembly technology constraints. This Data includes all information provided to the design team by assembly service providers from which may be derived constraints on which packages may be selected, mounting arrangements to be specified, permitted mounting areas, clearances, etc. Configuration management information and design change management information is provided. This data includes at least one geometric representation.

inscope.li: items within the scope of application module Design product data management, ISO/TS 10303-1628;
items within the scope of application module Specification document, ISO/TS 10303-1747.
